content.question:
In the last half of the twentieth century, voter turnout in federal elections has declined. During the same period, voter turnout has been higher in presidential elections that in midterm elections.
(a) Identify two factors that have contributed to the overall decline in turnout federal elections and explain how each factor has contributed to the overall decline.
(b) Identify and explain two reasons why voter turnout has been higher in presidential elections than in midterm elections.

frqParts.text:
In the last half of the twentieth century, voter turnout in federal elections has declined. During the same period, voter turnout has been higher in presidential elections that in midterm elections.
(a) Identify two factors that have contributed to the overall decline in turnout federal elections and explain how each factor has contributed to the overall decline.
(b) Identify and explain two reasons why voter turnout has been higher in presidential elections than in midterm elections.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
